sentence.Network_en: His lips curved up in the obligatory smile, acknowledging the compliment.
sentence.Network_cn: 他嘴边礼节性地挤出一个微笑，以示对称赞致谢。

sentence.Network_en: There was all the usual humbug and obligatory compliments from ministers.
sentence.Network_cn: 全都是些部长们常说的骗人鬼话和少不了的奉承恭维。

sentence.Network_en: She was wearing the obligatory sweater and pearl necklace.
sentence.Network_cn: 她穿着那件经常穿的毛衣，戴着那串惯常戴的珍珠项链。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from late Latin obligatorius, from Latin obligat- 'obliged', from the verb obligare (see oblige)

entry.tran: （按照规定或法律）必须履行的，强制性的
entry.def: If something is obligatory, you must do it because of a rule or a law.

example.ex: Most women will be offered an ultrasound scan during pregnancy, although it's not obligatory...
example.tran: 大多数处于妊娠期的妇女将被建议接受超声波检查，不过这不是强制性的。

example.ex: These rates do not include the charge for obligatory medical consultations.
example.tran: 这些费用不含必要的就诊费。

entry.tran: 习惯性的;礼节性的;随大溜的
entry.def: If you describe something as obligatory, you mean that it is done from habit or custom and not because the person involved has thought carefully about it or really means it.

example.ex: His lips curved up in the obligatory smile, acknowledging the compliment...
example.tran: 他嘴边礼节性地挤出一个微笑，以示对称赞致谢。

example.ex: She was wearing the obligatory sweater and pearl necklace.
example.tran: 她穿着那件经常穿的毛衣，戴着那串惯常戴的珍珠项链。

means.word_mean: 1. morally or legally constraining or binding;
2. required by obligation or compulsion or convention;

auth_sentence.content: Zakaah is an obligatory form of charity on savings.
auth_sentence.res_content: Zakaah is an obligatory form of charity on savings.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Zakaah is an obligatory form of charity on savings.

auth_sentence.content: But he argues minarets are not obligatory in Islam.
auth_sentence.res_content: But he argues minarets are not obligatory in Islam.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: But he argues minarets are not obligatory in Islam.

auth_sentence.content: When I have company I consider it obligatory.
auth_sentence.res_content: When I have company I consider it obligatory.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: When I have company I consider it obligatory.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表名词,"场所,地点"; 2. 表形容词,"有……性质的"

stems_affixes.word_buile: anticipate预期+atory有……性质的→anticipatory
condemn谴责+atory有……性质的→adj.非难的,处罚的
defame诽谤+atory有……性质的→adj.诽谤的
exclam=exclaim叫喊+atory有……性质的→adj.叫喊的,感叹的,惊叹的
explan=explain解释,说明+atory有……性质的→adj.解释[性]的,说明的
mand命令+atory有……性质的→adj.命令的,强迫的
oblige迫使,责成+atory有……性质的→adj.强制性的,义务的
propiti=propitiate讨好+atory有……性质的→adj.讨好的,调解的
conserve保存,保全+atory场所,地点→n.温室,音乐学院
labor劳动+atory场所,地点→劳动的地方→实验室
lav洗,冲+atory场所→冲洗的地方→洗手间
observe观察+atory场所,地点→用来观察的场所
purg纯洁+atory场所,地点→炼狱是人们净化灵魂之地

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表形容词,"……的"; 2. 表名词,"场所,范围"

stems_affixes.word_buile: minat威吓+ory……的→adj.威胁的,恫吓的
obligate有责任的;使负义务+ory……的→adj.强制性的,义务的
olfact闻,嗅+ory……的→adj.嗅觉的
per全部+empt拿走+ory……的→全部拿走→专横的
re反+fract打碎+ory……的→反过来打碎→宁愿折碎了也不弯
cremat焚烧+ory场所,范围→n.火葬场 adj.火葬的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 纹章,纹章学,兵工厂,军械库
stems_affixes.word_buile: arm武器+ory场所,范围→n.纹章,纹章学,兵工厂,军械库
conserve保存+at+ory场所,范围→n.温室,音乐学院
cremat焚烧+ory场所,范围→n.火葬场 adj.火葬的
deposit存放+ory场所,范围→n.储藏室

stems_affixes.value_cn: 人名地址录,[电话]号码簿
stems_affixes.word_buile: direct指导+ory场所,范围→n.人名地址录,[电话]号码簿
fact做+ory场所,范围→n.工厂

means.word_mean: 必须的, 必要的;要求的, 应尽的

sentences.en: It is obligatory on every citizen to safeguard our great motherland.
sentences.cn: 保卫我们伟大的祖国是每一个公民应尽的义务。
